paper_abstract: I argue that computer vision needs a core of techniques and foundational research to enable it to build on its current successes and achieve its enormous potential. "How do I know what papers to read in computer vision? There are so many. And they are so different." Graduate Student. Xi'An. China. November, 2011. (c) 2012 Published by Elsevier B.V.
paper_title: Computer vision needs a core and foundations
